mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.nd AS nd, a.yf AS yf, IFNULL(a.je, 0) AS paysum, IFNULL(b.je, 0) AS incomesum, a.user_id AS user_id FROM stat_payment_nd AS a LEFT JOIN stat_income_nd AS b ON a.nd = b.nd AND a.yf = b.yf AND a.user_id = b.user_id UNION SELECT b.nd AS nd, b.yf AS yf, IFNULL(a.je, 0) AS paysum, IFNULL(b.je, 0) AS incomesum, b.user_id AS user_id FROM stat_payment_nd AS a RIGHT JOIN stat_income_nd AS b ON a.nd = b.nd AND a.yf = b.yf AND a.user_id = b.user_id ) AS tab WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND nd = #{nd} ORDER BY nd, yf
